ygData.subject: RE: Kithicor Lore was Adventure vacations levels 12-15  *spoilers*
ygData.msgSnippet: Ok, now you have me hooked.  I HATE Kithicor!  It is the most scary place I have been - so far.  But I keep going back!  I have had Ged make me his Bearskin
ygData.messageBody:
Ok, now you have me hooked. I HATE Kithicor! It is the most scary place I
have been - so far. But I keep going back! I have had Ged make me his
Bearskin gloves and am looking for a HQ LION to get the finest ones in all
of Norrath. Jed's druid friend - she won't talk to me not even with my cha
song.

Is anyone keeping track of the various inter-twining of these kind of
things?

For example, talking to Furball Miller on the Miller farm. His sad story of
woe. Then, there is the letter from the DE that the halfling in the
Hogcallers Inn has (part of the Lady Shae quest.) I got the letter and read
it. It implies that you can get a special thing if you deliver it to the
correct person.

I wonder if there is some underlying tale about Norrath or are these just
independent little quest things.

Sylly.
-----Original Message-----
From: Elijah Meeker [mailto:elijah@...]
Sent: Monday, July 12, 1999 11:42 AM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Adventure vacations levels
12-15 *spoilers*

From: "Elijah Meeker" <elijah@...>

>Finally someone else notices...I get sick of those messages
that say
>something like, "We need to get rid of useless
zones....like Kithicor"


Heehee! What the "Levelquest" people miss in their mad dash
to "win"!

>I adventured there for more than a few levels, and I still
get a kick out of
>that dark place...Have you ever met Kithicor himself? I
saw him once by the
>cabin with the grizzley bears and the flag. He didn't say
much...



Want to hear some suspicions?

I think Ged and his Girlfriend (not recalling he name) are
either dead (we are talking to their
ghosts) or cursed. He (or she, likely she) may be a
werewolf. I think they had a nice little house
in the Kithicor until it was burned down or destroyed in
some manner.

That lake, that lake *sigh* there is something UP with it
(besides two piranha).

Anyway we have a bunch of really weird data points about it,
which might be random, but might NOT
be.

Truth is out there
:o)
Tszaaz
